name: anby
intro:
A mysterious young girl who never talks about her past, almost as if she didn't have one. 

She is calm and collected, and unusually competent and efficient in combat, almost as if she'd had years of training.

In an unexpected incident, Nicole brought her back to the Cunning Hares, and she's has an emotional independence on her ever since.

She loves watching movies, but due to certain lack of common sense she seems to almost think them real-life stories.

children.title: Basic Attack: Turbo Volt
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_normal"></custom-icon> to activate. Unleashes up to 4 slashes. The first 3 hits deal Physical DMG, the 4th hit deals Electric DMG.

children.title: Basic Attack: Thunderbolt
children.desc: After unleashing the 3rd hit of the Basic Attack, hold down or pause for a short while, and then press <custom-icon iconid="icon_normal"></custom-icon> to activate. Unleashes a downward strike that deals Electric DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: Dodge: Slide
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Taser Blast
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_normal"></custom-icon> during a dodge to activate. Slashes all nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Thunderclap
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_normal"></custom-icon> during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Fork Lightning
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"></custom-icon> to activate. Unleashes an upward slash that deals Electric DMG. This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd-hit of the Basic Attack or Basic Attack: Thunderbolt. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Lightning Bolt
children.desc: When Anby has enough energy, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special_ready"></custom-icon> to activate. Unleashes a powerful upward slash that deals Electric DMG. This attack launches faster when used after the 3rd hit of her Basic Attack or Basic Attack: Thunderbolt. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Electro Engine
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful upwards slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Overdrive Engine
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press the ultimate ability icon to activate. Unleashes a powerful attack that deals massive Electric DMG to enemies in a small area. Character is invulnerable during this skill's use.

children.title: Core Passive: Fluctuating Voltage
children.desc: Launch a Basic Attack: Thunderbolt, Special Attack, or EX Special Attack after the 3rd-hit of Anby's Basic Attack for an extra 32% Daze.

children.title: Additional Ability: Parallel Connection
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: When Anby's Dodge Counter hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Thunderfall
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"></custom-icon> to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Flash
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"></custom-icon> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, inflicting massive Daze. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Lightning Whirl
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"></custom-icon> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Perform a spinning slash against enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Rapid Charge Mode
talents.desc:
When the 4th-hit of Anby's Basic Attack hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.

Charge up for just a minute, and you're set to fight for an hour! That's the sales pitch for these weapon expansion modules. And they deliver exactly that.

talents.name: Precision Discharge
talents.desc:
Basic Attack: Thunderbolt hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's EX Special Attack hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.

Electric shocks will knock you out cold. Looking at the enemy out cold at her feet, she added: At least, that's what happens in the movies.

talents.name: Well-Disciplined
talents.desc:
Basic AttackDodgeSpecial AttackChain Attack Lv. +2

Run, slash, move like thunder. She is no amateur when it comes to Hollows, but an expert in the trade.

talents.name: Conducting Charge
talents.desc:
When Anby launches a Chain Attack or uses her Ultimate, off-field Electric characters recover 3 Energy. For every 12% of Anby's Energy Generation Rate, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6 additional Energy.

You won't last long fighting solo. An experienced Hollow Raider knows how to create opportunities for their teammates.

talents.name: Street Experience
talents.desc:
Basic AttackDodgeSpecial AttackChainAttack Lv. +2

Not only can working for the Cunning Hares improve your mental fortitude, but it will also help (read: force) you to improve your constitution.

talents.name: Charging Field
talents.desc:
When Anby uses her EX Special Attack, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her Basic Attack or Dash Attack, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.

Coils of electricity flickered over her fingertips. Anby raised her head, eyes brimming with determination beyond her years. Perhaps, one day, she will be the one with total mastery over electricity.

children.title: Basic Attack: Full Firepower
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes a piercing attack, dealing Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold to enter Crouching Shot to extend the attack duration. Move the joystick during Crouching Shot to launch Rolling Shot and adjust the character's position, dealing Physical DMG. Stop pressing or holding during Crouching Shot to launch Finishing Shot at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge: Risky Business
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Starlight Sanction
children.desc: When moving the joystick during a dodge, press . Launches a piercing attack at nearby enemies within a large area, dealing Physical DMG. When not moving the joystick during a dodge, press . Launches a piercing attack at enemies in a line, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Fair Fight
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Pierces enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Stand Still
children.desc: Press to activate. Performs up to 3 piercing attacks in a line, dealing Physical DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Clearance Time
children.desc: When Billy has enough Energy, press to activate. Launches a powerful piercing attack in a straight line, dealing massive Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Starlight Mirage
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Starlight Sparkle
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Unleashes a powerful piercing attack at surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Steady Shot
children.desc: Billy's DMG increases by 25% when he enters Crouching Shot during his Basic Attack. The effect ends if he moves, returns to standby, or is knocked back or launched by an attack.

children.title: Additional Ability: Team Starlight
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: After Billy uses a Chain Attack, the DMG of his next Ultimate is increased by 50%, stacking up to 2 times. This effect resets whenever an Ultimate is activated.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Power of Teamwork
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Launches a piercing attack at enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: rgb(255, 235, 97)">Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Evasive Assist: Flash Spin
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Dodges the enemy's attack and activates Vital View. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Fatal Shot
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after an Evasive Assist to activate. Pierces enemies in a large area in front, dealing <span style="color: rgb(255, 235, 97)">Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Dazzling Entrance
talents.desc:
When Billy hits an enemy with a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.

'You guys are way too honest to be bad guys!'

'All lined up, like NPCs at the shooting range!'

talents.name: Roaming Gunslinger
talents.desc:
Billy's Dodge Counter DMG increases by 25%.

Rolling Shots during his Basic Attacks are treated as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during the skill and able to trigger Perfect Dodges.

When a Rolling Shot triggers a Perfect Dodge, it will automatically become a Dodge Counter.

The Starlight Knights never run from danger. That's what we call tactical repositioning for better aim!

— User 'Dreamgirl Monica' from the Starlight Radiance messageboards.

talents.name: Teachings of the Starlight Knights
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Never neglect your training, and never stop improving! This is the philosophy of the Starlight Knights. Billy believes in it wholeheartedly, and practices it sincerely.

talents.name: Starlight Ballistics
talents.desc:
When Billy hits an enemy with his EX Special Attack, the skill's CRIT Rate is increased based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.

These explosive bullets of Billy's own invention are incredibly lethal at close range.

Their performance far outstrips Billy's original intention of simply making them cooler.

talents.name: Lost Technological Construct
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Unknown precision components and unique structural design have given Billy performance far beyond his peers... And maintenance costs far beyond his means.

talents.name: Starlight Hero
talents.desc:
When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a Perfect Dodge, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.

'Hooboy~ Feelin' great! Move aside, Anby, it's my time to shine!'

'Yo, Anby — can you play the Starlight Knight theme?'

—excerpt from Cunning Hares' 'Top 10 Forbidden Sentences,' selected by Anby

children.title: Basic Attack: Cunning Combo
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Basic Attack: Do As I Please
children.desc: After using a Special Attack, EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, Nicole can reload, and here Basic Attack and Dash Attack are enhanced, increasing the power of her bullets.

children.title: Dodge: Speed Demon
children.desc: Press to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. Move the joystick to dodge, then hold to reload while dodging, enhancing Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks up to 8 times.

children.title: Dash Attack: Jack in the Box
children.desc: When moving the joystick during a dodge, press : Dashes in the target direction and strikes nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG. When not moving the joystick during a dodge, press : Vaults backward and launches a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG. Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance her Basic Attack and Dash Attack, up to 8 times.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Diverted Bombard
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing Ether DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance Basic Attack and Dash Attack up to 8 times.

children.title: Special Attack: Sugarcoated Bullet
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes a ranged strike against enemies in front, dealing Ether DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill. Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance Basic Attack and Dash Attack up to 8 times.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Stuffed Sugarcoated Bullet
children.desc: When Nicole has enough Energy, press to activate. A powerful ranged strike, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal Ether DMG. Hold down to charge up this attack, during which a small energy field is generated at the muzzle as Energy is consumed, dealing bonus DMG to enemies nearby. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. A Reactive Assist is triggered when this skill hits an enemy. Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance Basic Attack and Dash Attack up to 8 times.

children.title: Chain Attack: Ether Shellacking
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful ranged strike at enemies in a small area, generating an energy field that pulls enemies towards its center to deal Ether DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. A Reactive Assist is triggered when this skill hits an enemy. Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance Basic Attack and Dash Attack up to 8 times.

children.title: Core Passive: Mechanical Case
children.desc: After hitting an enemy with a Special Attack, EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, Nicole can reload, enhancing her Basic Attack and Dash Attack. When her enhanced bullets or Energy Field hits an enemy, the target’s DEF is reduced by 24% for 2s.

children.title: Additional Ability: Hare of Many Burrows
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: When Nicole’s Core Passive: Mechanical Case applies a debuff, the target additionally takes 25% more Ether DMG

children.title: Reactive Assist: Emergency Bombard
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press to activate. Dodge backwards and send a ranged strike at enemies in front, dealing Ether DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. Automatically reloads after the attack to enhance her Basic Attack and Dash Attack, up to 8 times.

children.title: Defensive Assist: The Hare Strikes Back！
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press to activate. Parries the enemy’s attack, dealing massive Daze. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Window of Opportunity
children.desc: Press after a Defensive Assist to activate. Charge forward and bombard enemies, dealing Ether DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Supercharged Bomb
talents.desc:
The DMG and the Anomaly Buildup inflicted by Nicole’s EX Special Attack increases by 16%. For each additional 0.1s of charging when Nicole activates her EX Special Attack, the duration of the energy field created at the target location increases by 0.15s.

'I’ve juiced you all up! Go get ‘em!'

'Huh? I-I wasn’t slacking off, I swear – I just needed a break!'

talents.name: Charging Device
talents.desc:
When Nicole hits an enemy with her Basic Attack or Dash Attack, the attack’s Energy Generation Rate is increased by 15%.

'Never underestimate the value of a single second!'

'Do you have any idea how much extra I can squeeze out of just one second? It’s unfathomable!' 'So, can I get a productivity bonus? How about 10%, huh?'

talents.name: A Hare's Cunning
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Without overpowering might or abundant resources, Nicole depended on her own sharp mind to bring the Cunning Hares to where they are today.

talents.name: Field Expansion
talents.desc:
When Nicole uses her EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, the diameter of the energy field generated is increased by 3m.

'This, and this too - all of this will soon become the Cunning Hares’ territory. Do you hear me!' 'W-What? How soon?'

'Uh… in about ten thousand years, based on current revenue projections.'

talents.name: Industry Star
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv.+2

Though they have plenty of enemies in the industry, Nicole has led her team out of many impossible situations, and so their reputation and experience steadily grew.

talents.name: Corrupting Energy Field
talents.desc:
When Nicole’s energy fields deal DMG to an enemy, the target’s Anomaly Buildup RES is reduced by 2.2%, stacking up to 20 times, and lasting 12s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

A switch to higher quality ammo with better firepower and increased compressed Etheric Matter leads to higher damage, longer use duration… and higher costs.

children.title: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_normal"></custom-icon> to activate. Unleashes up to 4 mixed attacks in front, dealing Physical DMG. The 4th-hit is a Piledriver Attack.

children.title: Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode)
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_normal"></custom-icon> while Anton is in Burst Mode to activate. Unleashes up to 3 mixed attacks in front of him, dealing massive Electric DMG. During the 2nd Drill Attack and 3rd Piledriver Attack, repeatedly pressing or holding <custom-icon iconid="icon_normal"></custom-icon> increases the attack duration.

children.title: Dodge: Let's Move
children.desc: Press to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Fire With Fire
children.desc: Press during a Dodge to activate. Rams into enemies in front of him, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Retaliation
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Continuously strikes enemies in front of him with heavy punches, dealing Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this attack.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode)
children.desc:
While in Burst Mode, press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Launches a Drill Attack at enemies in front of him, dealing massive Electric DMG

Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Special Attack: Spin, Bro!
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes a Pile Driver Attack against enemies in a line in front, dealing Electric DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Smash the Horizon, Bro!
children.desc:
When Anton has enough Energy, press to activate. Launches several Pile Driver Attacks at enemies in a line in front of him, dealing massive Electric DMG.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Anton enters Burst Mode after using this skill.

When in Burst Mode, Anton's attacks become more powerful, dealing massive Electric DMG while continually consuming Energy upon hitting an enemy. Burst Mode remains active for up to 30 seconds or until his Energy is depleted.

children.title: Special Attack: Explosive Drill (Burst Mode)
children.desc: Press while in Burst Mode to activate. Launches a Pile Driver Attack at enemies in front, dealing Electric DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Go Go Go!
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a Pile Driver Attack onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive Electric DMG to enemies within range. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Go Go Go Go Go!
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_ultimate"> to activate. Unleashes a Pile Driver Attack onto the ground in front of him over a large area, dealing massive <span style="color: rgb(46, 182, 255)">Electric DMG to enemies within range.Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Brothers in Arms!
children.desc: When Anton uses his Pile Driver Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 12%. When he uses his Drill Attack, the skill's DMG is increased by 17.5%.

children.title: Additional Ability: Teamwork
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: While Anton is in Burst Mode and when attacking <span style="color: #47C7FD">Shocked enemies, for every 5 critical hits, an additional bout of <span style="color: #47C7FD">Shock DMG is triggered at 30% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Shoulder-To-Shoulder
children.desc: When the character in combat is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Continuously strikes enemies in front of him with heavy punches, dealing <span style="color: rgb(240, 209, 43)">Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Protective Drill (Burst Mode)
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Attacks enemies in front with a Drill Attack, dealing massive <span style="color: rgb(46, 182, 255)">Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Iron Wrist
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Limit Burst
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Launches a Drill Attack that ends in a Pile Driver Attack, dealing <span style="color: rgb(46, 182, 255)">Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Warm-Up Exercises
talents.desc:
When Drill Attack hits an enemy, Anton gains additional Energy. During a single use, a max of 5 Energy can be gained.

"Are you awake? Get spinning, bro!"

"Try and keep up. It’s time to do our stretches!"

talents.name: State of Flow
talents.desc:
When Anton uses his EX Special Attack and enters Burst Mode, he gains a Shield based on his Energy and equal to 3-9% of his max HP. The greater his Energy, the larger the Shield. The Shield dissipates when leaving Burst Mode.

After arduous training, a few lucky individuals will display exceptional vigor and perform above their usual level during high-intensity activities, entering a state of flow commonly known as 'being in the zone'.

Are you ready to get moving and enter the zone?

—Nitro-Fuel’s exclusive program 'Good Morning, Zealous Office Workers!'

talents.name: Rotational Training
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but in a complex and ever-changing Hollow worksite, having a wide skill set can prevent an opportunity to overcome difficulties.

talents.name: Everyone Get Fired Up!
talents.desc:
When Anton uses a Chain Attack or Ultimate, the squad's CRIT Rate increases by 10% for 12s.

'Find your rhythm, and let’s get moving!'

When Anton starts to get serious, everyone becomes more nimble. They have to keep up or else they will be training alone the next day.

talents.name: Jack of All Trades
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Knowing a bit of everything may seem underwhelming, but if you are resolute enough to change from 'knowing a bit' to 'being excellent', then you become omnipotent!

talents.name: Break the Limit
talents.desc:
When Anton's Pile Driver Attack triggers a critical hit, his Basic Attack: Enthusiastic Drills (Burst Mode) and Dodge Counter: Overload Drill (Burst Mode) deal 4% more DMG for 30s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

'Yeah bro, can you feel the burn?'

Whenever Anton wants to exceed his limits, his 'bro' starts spinning at an astonishing pace, its buzzing echoing Anton’s resolution.

children.title: Basic Attack: Wipeout
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button during the 3rd and 5th hits to extend the chainsaw slash attack.

children.title: Dodge: Shoo!
children.desc:
Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Oopsy-Daisy!
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw attack's duration.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Nope!
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Clean Sweep
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes a series of slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the the chainsaw slash attack. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Skirt Alert
children.desc: When Corin has enough Energy, press to activate. Unleashes a series of powerful slashes upon enemies in front, before detonating the chainsaw, dealing massive Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack at the cost of Energy if the attack connects. Character is invulnerable during the spinning slash. Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the extended slash, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

children.title: Chain Attack: Sorry...
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Very, Very Sorry!
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Hyperfocus
children.desc: When Corin uses an extended slash with her chainsaw, the attack's DMG increases by 20%.

children.title: Additional Ability: Cleanup Assistance
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: Corin deals 22.5% more DMG to Stunned enemies.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Emergency Measures
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Slashes enemies in front before detonating her chainsaw, dealing <span style="color: #FFEB61">Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold the button to extend the chainsaw slash attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Defensive Assist: P—Please allow me!
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Quick Sweep
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Unleash a series of slashes against enemies in front followed by an explosive chainsaw, dealing <span style="color: #FFEB61">Physical DMG. Repeatedly press or hold to extend the chainsaw slash attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Open Trauma
talents.desc:
When Corin's Chain Attack or Ultimate hits an enemy, her DMG against the target increases by 12% for 15s.

The young mistress always said, if something’s worth doing, it’s worth focusing on.

I’ve been practicing, and I can do it now!!

“But…are you watching me…?”

talents.name: Atomic Smash
talents.desc:
When Corin's EX Special Attack, Chain Attack or Ultimate hits an enemy, the target's Physical RES is reduced by 0.5%, stacking up to 20 times and lasting 5s. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

“Sorry, Mr. or Ms. Ethereal!”

“But I’ve got work to do… I really am sorry!”

Feeling guilty, Corin sincerely apologizes to the monster — as she wields her savage chainsaw, slicing through the enemies in her way.

talents.name: Amateur Maid
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

“I-I’ll do my best to become a good maid!” Corin said, walking towards the Ethereals, chainsaw in hand.

talents.name: Battlefield Retainer
talents.desc:
When Corin uses a Reactive Assist, Defensive Assist, or Chain Attack, she recovers 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 16s.

A Diligent and serious young maid, Corin always puts her heart and soul into everything she does.

Of course, that includes taking out enemies in combat.

talents.name: Special Ops Maid
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

“Uh…sorry, I’m so clumsy. I don’t know how to make sure my cuts are even…”

–Said Corin as she looked down at the bits of Ethereal scattered across the ground.

talents.name: Accumulated Release
talents.desc:
When Corin's extended slash hits an enemy, she obtains a stack of Charge (max 40 stacks). During a Dodge Counter, Special Attack, EX Special Attack, Reactive Assist, or Assist Follow-Up, when her chainsaw detonation hits an enemy, consumes all stacks of Charge. Each stack consumed causes the attack to deal an additional 3% of ATK as DMG.

Corin knows that she isn’t the most powerful of maids, nor the smartest. But she hopes to become the hardest working.

She puts to good use everything she’s ever learned.

children.title: Debt Reconciliation
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 3 strikes, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Missing Invoice
children.desc:
Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate.
A rapid dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack
children.desc: Press during a Dodge to activate. Strikes enemies in front of him, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Strike enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Fiscal Fist
children.desc: Press to activate. Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attack before unleashing a forward strike, dealing Physical DMG. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive Physical DMG. Hold to remain in the Blocking stance. While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time. After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time. The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP. Ben is invulnerable when activating Block. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while launching strikes.

children.title: EX Special Attack
children.desc: When Ben has enough Energy, press to activate. Ben lifts his weapon, blocking the enemy's attacks before unleashing a forward strike, dealing Fire DMG. Successfully blocking an attack enhances the power of this skill and triggers Block Counter, dealing massive Fire DMG. Hold to remain in the Blocking stance. While in the Blocking stance, Ben gains a Shield that weakens over time. After leaving the blocking stance, the Shield is removed and recovers over time. The Shield cannot exceed 16% of Ben's Max HP. When this skill is activated, the Shield is restored to its maximum value. After activating the skill, press again to follow up with a powerful forward strike, dealing massive Fire DMG. Ben is invulnerable when activating Block. Ben is invulnerable while launching strikes.

children.title: Signed and Sealed
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Unleashes a powerful strike at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Guardian
children.desc: Ben's ATK increases with his DEF. He gains 30% of his DEF as ATK. When Ben launches a follow-up attack during his EX Special Attack, the squad gains a Shield of 12.5% of his DEF + 100, lasting for 30s.

children.title: Contractual Agreement
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: While the Shield from Ben's Core Passive: Guardian is in effect, CRIT Rate is increased by 16%.

children.title: Joint Account
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Strikes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Risk Allocation
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Don't Break the Contract
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: rgb(248, 79, 54)">Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Reacting Force
talents.desc:
When successfully Blocking an enemy with Ben's Special Attack or EX Special Attack, the DMG dealt by the blocked enemy is reduced by 30% for 15s.

'Every action has an equal and opposite reaction. So why do you have to bash things head-on?'

'Looks like your calculations are off.'

talents.name: Offense Through Defense
talents.desc:
When successfully triggering a Block Counter during Ben's Special Attack or EX Special Attack, inflict an additional 300% of Ben's DEF as DMG.

Unlike other bear Thirens, Ben remains patient when fighting, he believes if he keeps his defenses up, he can wait until the enemy reveals their weakness.

talents.name: Careful Accounting
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Financial responsibility demands mastering cost-efficiency and utilizing every available resource to enhance both the team and oneself.

talents.name: Agile Adaptation
talents.desc:
When successfully blocking enemy DMG with Ben’s invulnerable effect during his Special Attack or EX Special Attack, the following counter deals 30% more DMG

Ben's professional accounting instincts let him adapt dynamically based on the situation. Whether dealing with accounts or enemies, it's important to achieve the best results at the lowest cost.

talents.name: Meticulous Detail
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Ben’s keen eye doesn’t miss a single error in statements.

The same goes for combat, where he gets progressively stronger as he corrects mistakes.

talents.name: Wild Spirit
talents.desc:
After launching an attack or follow-up attack during Ben's EX Special Attack, Daze inflicted by Basic Attacks, Dash Attack, and Dodge Counter is increased by 20%, lasting 12s.

Bear Thirens are different from canine Thirens.

They can’t be appeased with food alone.

When they lose their temper the only thing you can do is run for your life…

–The discontinued “Be a Good Neighbor! 100 Tips for Getting Along With Thirens”

children.title: Basic Attack: Making Rice Cakes
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 3 attacks, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Basic Attack: Making Rice Cakes (Frosted Banner)
children.desc: When Frosted Banner is active, press to activate. Unleashes up to 3 faster attacks in front, dealing Ice DMG.

children.title: Dodge: Grab a Bite
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: 50/50
children.desc: Press during a Dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dash Attack: 50/50 (Frosted Banner)
children.desc: When Frosted Banner is active, press during a Dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Away From My Snacks
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Cooling Bento
children.desc: Press to activate. Soukaku releases a wind current in front of her and unleashes her finishing move, dealing Ice DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%. Holding while using this skill allows for a quick transition to Fly the Flag.

children.title: Special Attack: Rally!
children.desc: Hold to activate. Soukaku plunges her weapon into the ground, morphs it into a flag, and launches Fly the Flag, dealing Ice DMG. Hitting an enemy with Fly Flag triggers a Reactive Assist. Pressing or after Fly the Flag activates a Special Attack as she retracts the flag, dealing Ice DMG. If Soukaku owns 3 stacks of Vortex on using Fly the Flag, she consumes all 3 stacks and enters the Frosted Banner state. In the Frosted Banner state, she can unleash an enhanced Basic Attack or an enhanced Dash Attack, dealing massive Ice DMG. This effect can last up to 45s or stack up to 6 times. Soukaku's weapon gains Vortexes in the following circumstances: Gains 1 stack of Vortex when launching an EX Special Attack, Gains 1 stack of Vortex when launching a Chain Attack, Gains 3 stacks of Vortex when launching an Ultimate. Soukaku can accumulate a maximum of 3 stacks of Vortex.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Fanning Mosquitoes
children.desc: When Soukaku has enough Energy, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special_ready"></custom-icon> to activate. Releases wind currents of extended range in front of her, dealing massive <span style="color: rgb(152, 239, 240)">Ice DMG. This skill can be used in rapid succession by pressing <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> repeatedly. Each use consumes a specified amount of Energy. When Soukaku's Energy is depleted, or you stop pressing the button, she unleashes a powerful finishing move that deals massive <span style="color: rgb(152, 239, 240)">Ice DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill, and her DMG taken is reduced by 40%. Holding <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> while using this skill allows for a quick transition to Fly the Flag.

children.title: Chain Attack: Pudding Slash
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Soukaku quickly unleashes a series of strikes at enemies in front of her and follows up with Fly the Flag, dealing massive <span style="color: rgb(152, 239, 240)">Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Extra Large Pudding Slash
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_ultimate"> to activate. Soukaku quickly unleashes a series of even more strikes at enemies in front of her and follows up with Fly the Flag, dealing massive <span style="color: rgb(152, 239, 240)">Ice DMG. Upon activating this skill, Soukaku enters the Masked state and deals 25% increased Daze for 15s. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Blade Flurry
children.desc: When Soukaku launches Fly the Flag, her ATK is increased by 6.25% of her base ATK for 12s. When consuming Vortex during Fly the Flag, the ATK increase is doubled. This buff given can be passed along to characters switching in via Chain Attacks or Assist Attacks triggered by Fly the Flag.

children.title: Additional Ability: Group Set Meal
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or faction: When Soukaku consumes Vortex to activate Fly the Flag, the <span style="color: rgb(152, 239, 240)">Ice DMG of the squad is increased by 15%.

children.title: Reactive Assist: A Set for Two
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: rgb(152, 239, 240)">Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Guarding Tactics
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Sweeping Strike
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: rgb(152, 239, 240)">Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Hypothermia
talents.desc:
If an enemy is hit by Fly the Flag, the target's Ice RES is reduced by 10% for 8s.

The custom-made weaponized Oni Flag features a powerful built-in cooling system, incorporating an Ether-infused catalyst that generates cold air to deal significant harm to struck enemies.

talents.name: Experimental Charging Module
talents.desc:
Basic Attacks, Dash Attacks, Dodge Counters, and Reactive Assists have a 15% chance upon hit to gain one stack of Vortex, triggering up to once per second. When Vortex reaches max stacks, further stacks gained grant Soukaku 1.2 Energy instead.

A charging module is able to continuously accumulate energy during battle. Therefore, it is regarded as an era-defining conceptual tactical weapon by the R&D department.

But for Soukaku, fully charging it simply means it's time to eat.

talents.name: Attendance Meal Allowance
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

There’s an easy way to incentivize Soukaku to train harder: just raise her meal allowance for attending.

talents.name: Uplifting Current
talents.desc:
Core Passive: Blade Flurry provides an extra 10% CRIT Rate upon triggering.

When charged, the special charging module can generate a wind current of Ether energy to charge surrounding Ether devices. To Soukaku, it's just like having a buffet with friends.

"Guys~ It's all-you-can-eat time!"

talents.name: Late-Night Snacks
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

A way to further incentivize Soukaku to train is simple: add a late-night snack to her meal attendance allowance.

talents.name: Northern Wind
talents.desc:
While in the Frosted Banner state, the number of usable enhanced Basic Attacks and enhanced Dash Attacks is increased to 12, while attacks also deal 45% more DMG.

Unlocking the safety device within the blade-flag allows it to operate at full capacity. It's not just for combat...it's also handy for cooling down a meal.

children.title: Basic Attack: Kitty Slash
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing Physical DMG. On the last hit, there is a 33.33% chance to repeat this hit 3 times.

children.title: Basic Attack: Crimson Blade
children.desc: Hold down during the first 3 hits of Nekomata's Basic Attack to activate. Slashes enemies in front and passes through them, dealing Physical DMG. Upon activation, there is a 33.33% chance to repeat this attack 3 times.

children.title: Dodge: Can't Touch Me-ow~
children.desc:
Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate.
A rapid dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Over Here!
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Phantom Claws
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Surprise Attack
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes a downward strike, dealing Physical DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Super Surprise Attack!
children.desc: When Nekomata has enough Energy, press to activate. Unleashes a powerful falling slash that deals massive Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Claw Swipe
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Claw Smash
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_ultimate"> to activate. Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive <span style="color: #FFEB61">Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Stealthy Paws
children.desc: When Nekomata's Dodge Counter or Reactive Assist hits an enemy, her DMG increases by 30% for 6s.

children.title: Additional Ability: Catwalk
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: After any character inflicts <span style="color: #FFEB61">Assault, increases the DMG of Nekomata's next EX Special Attack by 35%, stacking up to 2 times.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Cat's Paw
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: #FFEB61">Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Desperate Defense
children.desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate.
Parries the enemy's attack, inflicting massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Shadow Strike
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: #FFEB61">Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Cat & Mouse
talents.desc:
When there's only one enemy on the field and Nekomata is in combat, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 25%.

Cats always prefer to toy with their prey.

If there's only one mouse left in combat - that's Nekomata's play time.

talents.name: Bird Hunter
talents.desc:
When Nekomata hits an enemy from behind, she ignores 16% of her target's Physical RES. If the enemy is Stunned, all Nekomata's attacks are considered back attacks.

While Nekomata lacks strength due to her small size, she has the perceptiveness and agility required to locate her enemies' weaknesses and strike right where it hurts the most.

talents.name: Curious Left Tail
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of the cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within... Even if that's not true, the experience Nekomata has accumulated during her time out on the streets surely is.

talents.name: Sharpen Claws
talents.desc:
When Nekomata uses her EX Special Attack, her CRIT Rate increases by 7% for 15s, stacking up to 2 times, with each stack's duration being calculated separately.

Gimme more, gimme MORE! I can eat 'em all~

Her eyes sparkle as she licks the back of her paws.

talents.name: Lucky Right Tail
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

According to the legends of the old civilization, each tail represents one of the cat's many lives, with years of wisdom and experience stored within... Sometimes Nekomata wonders to herself: If she is lucky enough to keep surviving, will she eventually grow another tail?

talents.name: Predator Lineage
talents.desc: When Nekomata launches a Chain Attack or uses her Ultimate, her CRIT DMG increases by 18%, stacking up to 3 times, and expiring when she leaves battle. This effect gains max stacks immediately on defeating an enemy.

children.title: Moon Hunter
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 5 strikes in front, dealing Physical DMG. Hold down to charge up, increasing the power of the attack and dealing Ice DMG.

children.title: Suitable Positioning
children.desc: Press to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Keep it Clean
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Slides forward, launching a series of strikes in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Etiquette Manual
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Strikes enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Time to Hunt
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes a series of strikes in front, dealing Ice DMG. Hold down to charge up, increasing its power. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: Thrill of the Hunt
children.desc: When Lycaon has enough Energy, press to activate. Unleashes a series of powerful strikes in front, dealing massive Ice DMG. Hold down to charge up, consuming Energy and enhancing the power of the attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: As You Wish
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a series of powerful strikes at enemies in a small area in front of him, dealing massive Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Mission Complete
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Unleashes multiple powerful strikes at enemies in a large area, dealing massive Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Metallic Paws
children.desc: When Lycaon charges his Basic Attack to completion, the attack deals 40% increased Daze.

children.title: Elegant Predator
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: When Lycaon hits a Stunned enemy, the target's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35% (only activates once for the entire squad).

children.title: Wolf Pack
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press to activate. Strikes enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Disrupted Hunt
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Vengeful Counterattack
children.desc: Press after a Defensive Assist to activate. Creates an icicle in front, which strikes all enemies within range, dealing Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Full Moon Momentum
talents.desc:
When Lycaon charges his Special Attack or EX Special Attack to completion, the attack will deal 15% increased Daze. Can trigger once every 8s.

Records suggest that werewolves exposed to moonlight become significantly more aggressive.

"Don't stare directly at the moon."

talents.name: Energy Feedback
talents.desc:
When Stunning an enemy or triggering a squad member's Chain Attack, Lycaon gains 5 Energy. Can trigger once every 1s.

Canines receive a brief dopamine boost in their brains after completing semi-complex tasks. At that moment, if their owner pets them to show encouragement, they will be extremely happy...

—Excerpt from the "Handbook of Unreliable Canine Research"

talents.name: Attendant Training
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

His every gesture exudes poise, and his words and actions are as refreshing as a spring breeze. An attendant's training is about maintaining control over everything.

talents.name: Graceful Demeanor
talents.desc:
If attacked while charging or during a charged attack, Lycaon will immediately gain a Shield effect equal to 5% of his max HP, lasting for 5s. His Anti-Interrupt is increased for the Shield's duration. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

“An outstanding attendant maintains a graceful demeanor at any and all times.”

talents.name: Alpha Nature
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

His glance harbors a primal ferocity, and the echoes of his howls rumble within his throat. Regardless of his current gracefulness, underneath the formal wear, he's still untamed.

talents.name: Ruthless Hunter
talents.desc:
When a charged attack hits an enemy, the target suffers 10% increased DMG from Lycaon, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 12s. Only one stack can be gained per skill use, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

“Apologies, but given the circumstances, I will not show any mercy.”

“After all, if a fair fight is what you are after, a Hollow is not the place to look for it.”

children.title: Basic Attack: Warmup Sparks
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Basic Attack: Fire Suppression
children.desc: Press at the right moment to activate. Unleashes a set of more powerful slashes, dealing Fire DMG.

children.title: Dodge: Tempered Fire
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Blazing Fire
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dash Attack: Fire Suppression
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Backdraft
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Executes a powerful slash against enemies in front, dealing massive Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Raging Fire
children.desc: Press to activate. Slashes enemies nearby, dealing Fire DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Fervent Fire
children.desc: When Soldier 11 has enough Energy, press to activate. Unleashes a powerful slash at surrounding enemies, dealing massive Fire DMG. After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks will trigger Fire Suppression for up to 15s or 8 times. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Uplifting Flame
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive Fire DMG. After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks trigger Fire Suppression for the next 15s, up to 8 times. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Bellowing Flame
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_ultimate"> to activate. Unleashes a powerful upward slash at enemies in a small area, dealing massive <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG. After using this skill, Soldier 11's Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks trigger Fire Suppression for the next 15s, up to 8 times. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Heatwave
children.desc: When triggering Fire Suppression during a Basic Attack or Dash Attack, increase that attack's DMG by 35%.

children.title: Additional Ability: Fields of Fire
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: Soldier 11 deals 10% more <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG. When attacking Stunned enemies, this effect is further enhanced by an additional 22.5%.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Covering Fire
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Slashes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Hold the Line
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, inflicting massive Daze. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Reignition
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Charge and cross slash enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Rapid Heat
talents.desc:
When Soldier 11 enters combat or switches in, if her Energy is less than 40, her Energy is recovered to 80. This effect can trigger once every 50s.

Long-term high-intensity combat training allows Soldier 11 to complete mastery of her regulatory systems.

talents.name: Scorching Convergence
talents.desc:
When triggering Fire Suppression, Basic Attack, Dash Attack, and Dodge Counter DMG increases by 3%, up to 12 stacks, lasting 15s, with the duration of each stack calculated separately.

—From an anonymous soldier of the Obsidian Division

talents.name: Elite Soldier
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Soldier 11 always expects the most from herself, no matter if it's in training or physical combat. That is how she maintains her combat prowess.

talents.name: Indulgent Blaze
talents.desc: If Fire Suppression is triggered for the 1st, 2nd, or 3rd hit of a Basic Attack or for a Dash Attack, Anti-Interrupt Level is increased and DMG received is reduced by 18% during the triggering attack. If Fire Suppression is triggered for the 4th hit of a Basic Attack, the character is invulnerable during the triggering attack.

talents.name: Perfect Soldier
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

The road from elite to exemplar is long and difficult, but Soldier 11 grits her teeth and perseveres, as if there's something pushing her towards the goal of becoming a perfect soldier...

talents.name: Scorching Flow
talents.desc:
When Soldier 11 uses her EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When Fire Suppression is triggered, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, causing the current move to ignore 25% of the target's Fire RES.

The flames of the sword distorted the air with their heat. Her movements grew ever more impassioned, as if that heat seeped into her spirit with every breath, igniting her thoughts.

children.title: Basic Attack: Smash 'n' Bash
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 4 strikes, dealing Physical DMG. When Koleda has Furnace Fire, she can consume the effect to launch an enhanced Basic Attack after the 2nd hit, dealing massive Fire DMG. Koleda and Ben can team up when fighting together to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dodge: Wait 'n' See
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Tremble!
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Strikes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Don't Look Down on Me
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Strikes enemies in front and creates an explosion, dealing Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Hammer Time
children.desc: Press to activate. Strikes enemies in front and triggers an explosion, dealing Fire DMG. This skill launches faster and triggers an explosion when used after the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's Basic Attack or enhanced Basic Attack. When Koleda and Ben are both in your squad, and this skill is activated after an enhanced Basic Attack, they team up to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the skill. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Boiling Furnace
children.desc: When Koleda has enough Energy, press to activate. Strikes enemies in front and triggers a powerful explosion, dealing massive Fire DMG. Koleda also gains the Furnace Fire effect. This skill activates faster and triggers an explosion when used after the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's Basic Attack or enhanced Basic Attack. When Koleda and Ben are both in your squad and this skill is activated after an enhanced Basic Attack, they team up to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the skill. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Natural Disaster
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Unleashes a powerful explosion on enemies in a large area, dealing massive Fire DMG while also obtaining the Furnace Fire effect. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Hammerquake
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_ultimate"> to activate. Unleashes a powerful explosion on enemies in a large area in front, dealing massive <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG while also obtaining the Furnace Fire effect. Koleda and Ben can team up when fighting together to launch a coordinated attack, further increasing the power of the attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Demolition Hammer
children.desc: When Koleda uses her EX Special Attack or consumes Furnace Fire to use an enhanced Basic Attack, the Daze she deals increases by 30%.

children.title: Additional Ability: Belobog Management
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: When the explosion from Koleda's EX Special Attack hits an enemy, the target takes 35% more Chain Attack DMG while Stunned. This effect stacks up to 2 times and ends when the enemy recovers from Stun.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Coming Thru!
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Strikes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Protective Hammer
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Hammer Bell
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after a Defensive Assist to activate. Koleda charges and strikes enemies in front, dealing <span style="color: #F84F36">Fire DMG and obtaining Furnace Fire effect. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Beat of the Hammer
talents.desc:
After the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's Basic Attack or her enhancedBasic Attack, quickly use a Special Attack or EX Special Attack to increase the Daze dealt by 15%.

Her fiery temper is just a facade. In reality, Koleda's thoughts are quite intricate. For example, she knows when to swing her hammer for a more painful strike.

talents.name: Kinetic Recovery
talents.desc:
When Koleda's EX Special Attack hits an enemy, she recovers 60 Energy. Can trigger once every 45s.

Koleda believes perfect hammering has its own natural rhythm.

It's like tapping a tambourine, with each hit building up the tempo of the next beat.

Of course, it's hard to say how many taps her 'toys' can endure.

talents.name: "Mind Your Own!"
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

As a qualified 'toy,' you better not cause trouble when Koleda starts to get a feel for swinging her hammer. Just take the beating.

— After all, what's the point of resisting?

talents.name: Furnace's Glow
talents.desc:
Koleda gains one stack of Charge (max 2 stacks) when expending Furnace Fire to use her Enhanced Basic Attack. When her Chain Attack or Ultimate hits an enemy, she consumes all stacks of Charge to increase the DMG by 18% per stack.

Koleda feels the flames of war as her hammer swings raise the surrounding temperature. 

She's now even more flammable and explosive than Ether.

talents.name: "You Dare Underestimate Me?"
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Koleda cares deeply about her role as a young leader potentially causing others to underestimate Belobog Heavy Industries. To compensate, she consistently trains diligently in secret.

talents.name: Saturated Blast
talents.desc:
When EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate triggers an explosion that hits an enemy, it deals additional DMG equal to 360% of Koleda's ATK.

There are two types of people that Koleda really hates:

Stupid people, and hopelessly stupid people.

Luckily for her, Belobog always has a good supply of strong Ether explosives — plenty to use on the stupid.

children.title: Basic Attack: High-Pressure Spike
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 4 attacks, dealing Physical DMG. While launching Basic Attacks, move the joystick to attack while moving. This allows Grace to reposition herself and deals Physical DMG. While Grace is launching Basic Attacks, her Basic Attack combo will not be interrupted by her Special Attacks, EX Special Attacks, Dodge, Dash Attacks, or Dodge Counter.

children.title: Dodge: Safety Regulation
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Quick Inspection
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Slide forward while shooting, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Violation Penalty
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Throws a grenade at enemies, dealing Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Obstruction Removal
children.desc: Press to activate. Throws a grenade to the front, dealing Electric DMG. Upon use, move the joystick to change directions. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Supercharged Obstruction Removal
children.desc: Press to activate when there is enough Energy. Leap in the air and throw two grenades to the front, dealing massive Electric DMG. Upon use, move the joystick to change directions. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Collaborative Construction
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Throws three grenades into the air then strafes to detonate them, dealing massive Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Demolition Blast - Beware
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Throws a custom grenade which explodes in the air and splits into four smaller grenades, dealing massive Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Pre-Driven Needle
children.desc: When Grace's Basic Attack or Dash Attack hits an enemy and deals <span style="color: #FFEB61">Physical DMG, she gains 1 stack of Zap (up to 8 stacks). Upon reaching the maximum stacks, using a Special Attack or EX Special Attack will consume all stacks of Zap, increasing the accumulated <span style="color: #47C7FD">Electric Anomaly Buildup by 65%.

children.title: Additional Ability: Tech Support Dept.
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: Upon hitting an enemy with an EX Special Attack, the <span style="color: #47C7FD">Shock DMG the enemy suffers increases by 25%. This effect can stack up to 2 times, and each enemy can trigger it once per 1s. Resets when the <span style="color: #47C7FD">Shock effect ends.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Incident Management
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched in the air, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Throws a grenade at the enemy, dealing <span style="color: #47C7FD">Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Evasive Assist: Rapid Risk Response
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"> to activate. Dodges the enemy's attack and activates the Vital View. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Counter Volt Needle
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_special"> after an Evasive Assist to activate. Unleashes a spinning hail of bullets against enemies in front and throws a grenade, dealing <span style="color: #47C7FD">Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Recharge Chamber
talents.desc:
When the 4th hit of Grace's Basic Attack connects with an enemy, all squad members gain 0.25 Energy. Within the same move, this effect can grant a max of 2 Energy to the squad.

Efficiency is the lifeblood of engineering, and within Grace’s gun barrel resonates its heartbeat.

talents.name: Lightning Piercer
talents.desc:
When Grace's thrown grenade hits an enemy during a Basic Attack, Special Attack, or EX Special Attack, the target's Electric RES is reduced by 8.5%, and Electric Anomaly Buildup RES is reduced by 8.5%, lasting for 8s.

“Dissecting” complex mechanical structures is Grace’s greatest hobby, even in the midst of battle.

How does it feel to get taken apart, with every vulnerability laid bare?

talents.name: Chief Mechanic
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Grace was personally involved in writing the “Belobog Industries’ Construction Safety Guidelines.”

She’s also the employee who violated the “no dangerous explosives at construction sites” policy the most times.

talents.name: Burst Capacitor
talents.desc:
When using her EX Special Attack, Grace gains 6 stacks of Charge (max 6 stacks). When her Basic Attack or Dash Attack hits an enemy, she expends 1 stack of Charge to increase her Energy Generation Rate for the current skill by 25%.

Anton suspected within the component Grace referred to as the “Electropulse Recycling Module” there was, in fact, an Ether hamster tirelessly generating energy around the clock.

“Can you equip my bro with one?”

talents.name: "Frosty Cold Iron Witch"
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

The “Frosty Cold Iron Witch” is capable of taming any mechanical beast, or at least that’s what the anonymous fan who came up with the name thinks.

talents.name: Detonation Trigger
talents.desc:
Activating a Special Attack or EX Special Attack after consuming all stacks of Zap enhances the skill, making Grace throw an additional grenade and increasing each grenade's DMG to 200% of its original value.

The average blood temperature of Belobog Heavy Industries’ employees is ninety-eight degrees Celsius.

Grace is often viewed as the safety valve keeping them all from boiling.

When even Grace gives up control, it’s a sign for everyone to cover their ears.

name: ellen
intro: What a pain... Can't you just give up already?

children.title: Basic Attack: Saw Teeth Trimming
children.desc: Press to activate. Unleashes up to 3 attacks, dealing Physical DMG. Hold or repeatedly press during the 3rd attack to extend the attack duration.

children.title: Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming
children.desc: While Flash Freeze is in effect, press to activate. Launch up to 3 attacks at enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG. Each attack consumes 1 point of Flash Freeze Charge. Hold or repeatedly press during the 3rd attack to extend the attack duration.

children.title: Dodge: Vortex
children.desc: Press to activate. A rapid dash dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. When Perfect Dodge is triggered, Ellen gains the Quick Charge effect, reducing the charge time of Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush, lasting up to 5 seconds or until it triggers.

children.title: Dash: Roaming Hunt
children.desc: Hold or double-press to activate. Enter the Roaming state, allowing dashing movement. In the Roaming state, use the joystick to control Ellen's direction, and release to stop. Ellen is invulnerable for a brief time after activation.

children.title: Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush
children.desc: While in the Roaming state, press to activate. Delivers a spinning slash to enemies before opening her scissors for a swift scissor attack, dealing Ice DMG. Gain 1 point of Flash Freeze Charge when the swift scissor attack hits. While in the Roaming state, hold to activate. Perform a spinning slash against the enemy, then pull apart the scissors to unleash a charged scissor strike, dealing massive Ice DMG. Gain 3 points of Flash Freeze Charge when the charged scissor attack hits. If the enemy is Frozen, it always triggers Shatter. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while charging the skill, and DMG taken is reduced. Ellen becomes briefly invulnerable during the skill.

children.title: Flash Freeze
children.desc: When Ellen has Flash Freeze charges, the Flash Freeze effect is activated. Once Flash Freeze activates, Basic Attacks and Dash Attacks expend Flash Freeze Charges, dealing massive Ice DMG. Ellen can have up to a maximum of 6 Flash Freeze Charges.

children.title: Dash Attack: Monstrous Wave
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dash Attack: Cold Snap
children.desc: While Flash Freeze is in effect, press during a dodge to activate. Launches a dashing slash attack at enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG. Consumes 1 point of Flash Freeze Charge.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Reef Rock
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Rapidly move through enemies with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Special Attack: Drift
children.desc: Press to activate. Use a quick tail sweep attack in front, dealing Ice DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe
children.desc: When Ellen has enough Energy, press to activate. Perform a forceful tail whip attack that deals massive Ice DMG. Gain 1 Flash Freeze Charge upon striking an enemy. After executing the move, you can directly follow up with the 3rd-hit of a Basic Attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Sharknami
children.desc: After activating EX Special Attack: Tail Swipe, press when Ellen has enough Energy to activate a series of powerful slashes forward, dealing massive Ice DMG. Gain 1 Flash Freeze Charge upon hitting an enemy. After executing the move, you can directly follow up with the 3rd-hit of a Basic Attack. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Avalanche
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm, dealing massive Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Endless Winter
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Crash down from above and unleash an ice storm before a powerful scissor strike, dealing massive Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Sharp-Toothed
children.desc: When Ellen launches a charged scissor strike during Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush, or consumes a Flash Freeze Charge to activate Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming, the skill's CRIT DMG is increased.

children.title: Additional Ability: Rising Storm
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: When Ellen deals Ice DMG, subsequent Ice DMG increases by 3% for 10s. This effect can stack up to 10 times, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Shark Sentinel
children.desc: When the character on the field is knocked back, press to activate. Speedily move through the enemy with open scissors for a cutting strike, dealing Ice DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. When the character on the field is launched, move the joystick and press to activate. Enter the Roaming state, enabling dashing movement. While roaming, use the joystick to change directions and release to stop. Character is invulnerable briefly when triggering the skill. Upon triggering a Reactive Assist, Ellen gains the Quick Charge effect, shortening the charging time of Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush, lasting up to 5s or until it triggers once.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Wavefront Impact
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"></custom-icon> to activate. Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Shark Cruiser
