children.desc: Press after a Defensive Assist to activate. Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG. Repeatedly press or hold during the attack to extend the duration of the skill. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Glacial Omen
talents.desc:
Upon hitting an enemy with a quick scissor strike during Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush, the obtained Flash Freeze Charges is increased to 3. When hitting an enemy with a charged scissor strike, the obtained Flash Freeze Charges is increased to 6. For each point of Flash Freeze Charge spent, Ellen's CRIT Rate is increased by 2% for 15s, stacking up to 6 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

Chilling winds are an omen of winter, and a signal that Ellen is about to apply for an extended leave to hibernate.

Speaking of which, do sharks actually need to hibernate?

talents.name: Arctic Ocean Predator
talents.desc:
The 3rd hit of Basic Attack: Flash Freeze Trimming can be directly followed up with EX Special Attack: Sharknami. For each point of Flash Freeze Charge when using an EX Special Attack, the current attack's CRIT DMG is increased by 20%, up to a max of 60%.

Despite being freshly stained with red, the massive shears held by Ellen lacked any trace of warmth.

The icy cold stems from her iron-forged instrument, as well as the fear of facing a predator such as herself.

talents.name: Overtime-Intolerant
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

The whole point of “efficiency” is being able to go home early and sleep.

So strike harder and strike faster.

talents.name: Endless Hoarfrost
talents.desc:
Whenever a squad member Freezes or Stuns an enemy, Ellen gains 6 Flash Freeze Charges and the Quick Charge effect, and recovers 4 Energy. The Energy recovery effect can trigger once per 10s.

A relentless assault of piercing cold. Terrifying monstrosities will learn the beauty and cruelty of winter under Ellen’s blade.

But, actually, the endless work that maids have during holidays is far more cruel…

talents.name: Adequate Sleep
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Except for when in the toughest of battles, Ellen always seems to have that “I can fall asleep at any moment” look.

Many an enemy has met their demise after underestimating Ellen because of it.

talents.name: The Feast Begins
talents.desc:
When an EX Special Attack or Dash Attack: Arctic Ambush hits an enemy, Ellen's PEN Ratio increases by 30% for 6s.

An open wound, a drop of blood. A thrilling hunt, a grand feast. A fragile life, a moment of satisfaction.

children.title: Basic Attack: Whack the Dimwit
children.desc: Press to activate. Order Drusilla and Anastella to attack up to 4 times, dealing Physical DMG and Electric DMG. Performing other actions with Alexandrina during Drusilla and Anastella's attacks will not interrupt Alexandrina's Basic Attack combo count.

children.title: Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool
children.desc: Hold or to activate. Calls back Drusilla and Anastella to swing them around for a ranged attack, dealing Electric DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: Dodge: Dress Adjustment
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Sudden Surprise
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate. Order Drusilla and Anastella to execute a piercing attack, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Bangboo Callback
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward and trigger an explosion, dealing Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Beat the Blockhead
children.desc: Press to activate. Order Anastella to execute a falling attack, dealing Electric DMG. Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Dimwit Disappearing Trick
children.desc: When Alexandrina has enough Energy, press to activate. Order Anastella to execute multiple falling attacks, dealing massive Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. A Reactive Assist is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

children.title: Chain Attack: Code of Conduct
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate a ball-shaped electrical field that deals massive Electric DMG. During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to perform Basic Attacks, Dash Attacks, Special Attacks, and EX Special Attacks, but can be recalled to Alexandrina's side through Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. A Reactive Assist is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

children.title: Ultimate: The Queen's Attendants
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward and deal massive Electric DMG. During this skill, Drusilla and Anastella are unable to perform Basic Attacks, Dash Attacks, Special Attacks, and EX Special Attacks, but can be recalled to Alexandrina's side through Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. A Reactive Assist is triggered when this skill hits an enemy.

children.title: Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner
children.desc: When ordering Drusilla or Anastella to attack, other squad members' PEN Ratio increases together with Alexandrina's, by 25% + 8% of Alexandrina's PEN Ratio, up to 35%. The effect ends when both Drusilla and Anastella return to Alexandrina.

children.title: Additional Ability: Banquet of Perfection
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: Increases the duration of Shock inflicted on enemies by any character by 3 seconds. When Shocked enemies are on the field, all squad members' Electric DMG increases by 15%.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Duple Meter Allemande
children.desc: When the character on field is launched, press to activate. Order Drusilla and Anastella to spin forward and trigger an explosion, dealing Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Evasive Assist: Triple Meter Courante
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press to activate. Dodges the enemy's attack and activates the Vital View. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Quadruple Meter Gavotte
children.desc: Press after an Evasive Assist to trigger. Order Drusilla and Anastella to push forward and generate an electrical vortex, dealing Electric DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Dance Duet
talents.desc:
After being sent out to launch an attack, Drusilla and Anastella stay in place for an additional 5.5s before returning to Alexandrina. The effect gained from Core Passive: Mini Destruction Partner by characters within 10m is increased to 130% of the original value.

“Get your work done, or you’re in for a beating!” is how Drusilla tries to encourage everyone.

“Yeh, a beating!” Anastella always chimes in.

talents.name: Master's Paragon
talents.desc:
Rina's Anomaly Proficiency is increased by 50 when both Drusilla and Anastella have been sent out. The effect ends when Drusilla or Anastella returns to Alexandrina.

“It takes an excellent head maid to lead excellent maids, and an exemplary master to raise exemplary Bangboo.” – Excerpt from Alexandrina’s speech at the “Victoria Housekeeping Human Resource Management and Bangboo Training Insight Seminar.”

talents.name: Head Maid's Specialty
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

Rina always has the confidence to excel at anything and the ability to annihilate everything.

However, when it comes to being in the mood to annihilate enemies, both her confidence and capability align.

talents.name: Needle and Hammer
talents.desc:
When Basic Attack: Shoo the Fool hits an enemy, the target's Anomaly Buildup RES is reduced by 27%, lasting 10s. Triggers once per 15s.

Drusilla and Anastella can never agree on anything.

“Beating up the dummy in front” is an exception.

talents.name: Head Maid Perfectionist
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

“Rina” means perfection in the Bangboo language.

Perfectionism is the number one rule in the Victoria Housekeeping handbook.

And Alexandrina has her own criteria for judging “perfection.”

talents.name: Stormy Night's Fright
talents.desc:
When an EX Special Attack, Chain Attack or Ultimate hits an enemy, the entire squad's Electric DMG is increased by 32% for 8s.

Thunder rumbles in the old castle on a rainy night. The depths of the long corridors are filled with eerie shadows.

Fear circuits overloaded, the filming of a thriller commences.

children.title: Basic Attack: Don't Move!
children.desc: [Assault Mode] Press to activate. Unleash a flurry of martial arts, bullets, and Ether Buckshots in a series of up to 5 attacks, dealing Physical DMG and Ether DMG. Upon activation of the 5th hit, obtain 1 Enhanced Shotshell. While using this skill, move the joystick and press to activate Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive and readjust to face the selected direction. While under Assault Mode, hold to switch to Suppressive Mode.

children.title: Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist
children.desc: [Suppressive Mode] Hold to activate. Unleash up to 3 Shotshell piercing attacks, dealing Physical DMG. If Zhu Yuan has Enhanced Shotshells upon firing, 1 Enhanced Shotshell will be consumed, dealing massive Ether DMG. While using this skill, move the joystick to activate her Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower and readjust to face the selected direction. While in Suppressive Mode, release to return to Assault Mode.

children.title: Dodge: Tactical Detour
children.desc: Press <custom-icon iconid="icon_evade"></custom-icon> to activate. A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Firepower Offensive
children.desc: [Assault Mode] Press during a dodge to activate. Uses handgun to attack, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower
children.desc: [Suppressive Mode] Press during a dodge to activate. Unleashes a Shotshell piercing attack, dealing Physical DMG. If Zhu Yuan has Enhanced Shotshells upon firing, 1 Enhanced Shotshell will be consumed, dealing massive Ether DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Defensive Counter
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate. Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing Ether DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Buckshot Blast
children.desc: Press to activate. Shoots Ether Buckshots that deal Ether DMG. This can be repeated 3 times by repeatedly pressing . Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Full Barrage
children.desc: When Zhu Yuan has enough Energy, press to activate. Shoots a series of Ether Buckshots, that explode and deal massive Ether DMG. Upon activation, gain 3 Enhanced Shotshells. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Eradication Mode
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate. Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive Ether DMG. Upon activation, gain 3 Enhanced Shotshells. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Max Eradication Mode
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate. Uses Modified Master Firearm to execute a saturated attack, firing lasers and seeking missiles to deal massive Ether DMG. Upon activation, gain 3 Enhanced Shotshells. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Special Ops Ammunition
children.desc: When Zhu Yuan is under Suppressive Mode, using Enhanced Shotshells to attack increases her DMG by 20%. When attacking Stunned enemies, this DMG boost is further increased by 20%.

children.title: Additional Ability: Tactical Coordination
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: Increases her CRIT Rate by 30% for 10s after using an EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate.

children.title: Reactive Assist: Covering Fire
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press to activate. Shoots enemies in front with an Ether Buckshot, dealing Ether DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Evasive Assist: Guarded Backup
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press to activate. Dodges the enemy's attack and activates the Vital View. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Defensive Counter
children.desc: Press after an Evasive Assist to activate. Attack with a combination of martial arts and shotshells, dealing Physical DMG and Ether DMG. Upon activation, gain 3 Enhanced Shotshells. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

talents.name: Quick Reload
talents.desc:
When Zhu Yuan activates Chain Attacks or Ultimates, gain the Quick Reload effect. When Zhu Yuan has the Quick Reload effect and uses up all Enhanced Shotshells, the effect will be consumed to instantly gain 6/9 Enhanced Shotshells.

Zhu Yuan once competed in the Janus Quarter’s Public Security Officer Contest, clinching first place with her extraordinary reloading techniques. Her colleague commented: “It’s nothing but sheer practice.”

talents.name: Ether Ember
talents.desc:
In Suppressive Mode, Zhu Yuan’s Anti-Interrupt level is increased, and DMG taken is reduced by 10%. When hitting an enemy with Enhanced Shotshells, the target takes 10% more DMG from Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist and Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower, stacking up to 5 times and lasting for 5s. Each shot adds one stack, and repeated triggers reset the duration.

Zhu Yuan is equipped with Ether bullets specially designed by Public Security, causing irreversible corruption upon hitting the enemy. She warns her enemies to surrender to ensure their health and safety…

talents.name: Public Security Special Training
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack levels are increased by 2.

As an elite Public Security Officer, Zhu Yuan’s training aimed to enhance all combat abilities within the Hollow, outmatching any criminal.

talents.name: Ether Perforation
talents.desc:
When hitting an enemy with Enhanced Shotshells, Zhu Yuan's Basic Attack: Please Do Not Resist and Dash Attack: Overwhelming Firepower ignore 25% of the target’s Ether RES.

Zhu Yuan’s custom magazine can recharge itself with the Ether in the air, surprising her enemies in battle.

talents.name: Special Ops Experience
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack levels are increased by 2.

A seasoned Public Security Officer like Zhu Yuan excels at reading the battlefield and maximizing combat efficiency.

talents.name: Expanded Energy Pack III
talents.desc:
After consuming 12 Enhanced Shotshells, Zhu Yuan receives the Ether Afterglow effect, reducing the Energy cost of the next EX Special Attack by 30. Using an EX Special Attack consumes Ether Afterglow and adds an additional 4-bullet Ether Buckshot, each dealing DMG equal to 220% of Zhu Yuan’s ATK.

Zhu Yuan is equipped with an energy pack that offers high capacity and long-lasting endurance, alleviating her concerns about battery life.

children.title: Basic Attack: Load Up and Roll Out
children.desc: Press to activate: Unleashes up to 5 slashes, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dash Attack: Pedal to the Metal
children.desc: Press during a dodge to activate: Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Power Drift
children.desc: Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate: Unleash a downward smash attack in front, dealing Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dodge: Handbrake Drift
children.desc: Press to activate: A rapid dodge. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Quick Assist: Brake Tap
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press to activate: Launches a downward smash attack at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Emergency Brake
children.desc:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"></custom-icon> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of <color=#ffffff>Assist Points</color> when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Overtaking Maneuver
children.desc: Press after a Defensive Assist to activate: Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Tire Spin
children.desc: Press to activate: Piper spins and launches a sweeping slash around her, dealing Physical DMG. Hold to extend the skill duration, unleashing increasingly powerful spinning slashes and increasing the charge level of the skill, up to 2 times. If the skill is used after the first 3 hits of a Basic Attack, Dash Attack, or Dodge Counter, Special Attack: Tire Spin of an increased charge level will quickly activate. During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

children.title: Special Attack: One Trillion Tons
children.desc: While Special Attack: Tire Spin is active, release to trigger a downward smash attack based on the charge level of Special Attack: Tire Spin, dealing Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Engine Spin
children.desc: With enough Energy, continue holding after Special Attack: Tire Spin reaches maximum charge level to activate: Piper rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes around her, dealing massive Physical DMG. This skill consumes Energy continuously for up to 3s. During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Really Heavy
children.desc: During EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, release to activate: Piper unleashes a downward smash attack, dealing massive Physical DMG. If the duration of EX Special Attack: Engine Spin reaches its limit or Energy drops to 20, EX Special Attack: Really Heavy will automatically activate. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Chain Attack: Buckle Up
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate: Unleashes a powerful downward smash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Ultimate: Hold~ On~ Tight~
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate: Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Core Passive: Power Charge
children.desc: When Piper's EX Special Attack: Engine Spin or Ultimate hits an enemy, she gains 1 stack of Power, up to a maximum of 20 stacks, lasting for 12s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. For every stack of Power, Piper's Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by 2%.

children.title: Additional Ability: Synced Acceleration
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: When Piper has 20 or more stacks of Power, all squad members' DMG is increased by 18%.

talents.name: Leisure Moment
talents.desc: When Piper’s Special Attack: Tire Spin, EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, or Ultimate hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of Power. The maximum stack limit of Power is increased to 30.

talents.name: Motivation
talents.desc: During Special Attack: Tire Spin and EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, Piper’s movement speed increases. When using Special Attack: One Trillion Tons, EX Special Attack: Really Heavy, or Ultimate to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the Physical DMG dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For every stack of Power, this buff is further increased by 1%.

talents.name: Truck Expert
talents.desc: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

talents.name: Refined Techniques
talents.desc: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger every 30s.

talents.name: Personal Hobbies
talents.desc: Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv.+2

talents.name: Mild Excitement
talents.desc: Increases the duration limit of EX Special Attack: Engine Spin by 2s and extends the duration of Power by 4s.

children.title: Basic Attack: Lady's Bat
children.desc:
Press to activate:

Strike forward up to 4 times, dealing Physical DMG and Fire DMG.

When Lucy uses her fourth Basic Attack, the currently on-field guard boars will launch Guard Boars: Spinning Swing! together.

children.title: Guard Boars: To Arms!
children.desc: In combat, the guard boars will randomly use a baseball bat, boxing gloves, or a slingshot to automatically attack enemies, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!
children.desc:
When Lucy uses the fourth Basic Attack, or when she gains the Cheer On! status, the guard boars will whirl their baseball bats in a continuous motion, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

If the attack cannot be executed immediately, the guard boars will remember the required number of times to execute it.

children.title: Dodge: Foul Ball!
children.desc:
Press to activate:

A rapid dodge.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Dash Attack: Fearless Boar!
children.desc:
Press during dodge to activate:

Rapidly strikes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

children.title: Dodge Counter: Returning Tusk!
children.desc:
Press during a Perfect Dodge to activate:

Strike enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Quick Assist: Hit By Pitch!
children.desc: When the on-field character is launched, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"></custom-icon> to activate: Strikes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable during the attack.

children.title: Defensive Assist: Safe on Base!
children.desc: When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <custom-icon iconid="icon_switch"></custom-icon> to activate: Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Assist Follow-Up: Scored a Run!
children.desc: Press after a Defensive Assist to activate: Strikes enemies in front, dealing Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Special Attack: Solid Hit!
children.desc: Press to activate: Recall a guard boar and launch it as a Line Drive. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing Fire DMG. Hold to activate: Recall a guard boar and launch it as a Fly Ball. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing Fire DMG.

children.title: EX Special Attack: Home Run!
children.desc: With enough Energy, press to activate: Recall a guard boar and launch it as a Line Drive. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon hitting enemies or walls, dealing massive Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a Quick Assist. With enough Energy, hold to activate: Recall a guard boar and launch it as Fly Ball. The guard boar will cause an explosion upon landing, dealing massive Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

children.title: Cheer On!
children.desc: After using EX Special Attack, when a guard boar triggers an explosion, it will apply the Cheer On! status to all allies, Bangboo, and the guard boars themselves. While under the Cheer On! status, allies' ATK increases by 13.8% of Lucy's ATK + 44, up to a maximum of 600. The Cheer On! status lasts for 10s when a Line Drive is hit, and 15s when a Fly Ball is hit. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

children.title: Chain Attack: Grand Slam!
children.desc: When a Chain Attack is triggered, select the character to activate: Lucy jumps up and sends a guard boar at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive Fire DMG. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a Quick Assist.

children.title: Ultimate: Walk-Off Home Run!
children.desc: When Decibel Rating is at Maximum, press to activate: Launch all guard boars sequentially, dealing massive Fire DMG in a large area to enemies ahead. While using this skill, other squad members recover 10 energy, and the next character to switch in gains an additional 20 energy. Character is invulnerable while using this skill. When the skill hits an enemy, it triggers a Quick Assist.

children.title: Core Passive: Crimson Mane Guard
children.desc: When Lucy uses her Special Attack or EX Special Attack, a guard boar will join the battle and call in two other guard boars. The guard boars inherit Lucy's ATK and Impact. The Cheer On! buff for the guard boars is increased to 140% of the original effect, and their attack frequency is increased.

children.title: Additional Ability: Batter Up!
children.desc: When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction: The guard boars inherit Lucy's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG.

talents.name: Drill Formations
talents.desc:
When the guard boars launch Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!, Lucy recovers 2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 15s, with each guard boar having its own separate cooldown.

"Grassy, eyes right! ...That's left, you idiot!!!" One command, two directions, three cries of pain, and wails all around.

talents.name: Little Boar Captain
talents.desc:
When Lucy uses a Chain Attack or Ultimate, it grants all squad members, Bangboo, and the guard boars the Cheer On! status for 10s.

"Without a doubt, Captain Lucy is the best leader of the Calydon Boar Thirens!" This was Woody's conclusion in the "Sons of Calydon Annual Report."

talents.name: Ironfist Overseer
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

"I just wish Captain Lucy would be more gentle when she's smacking us around." Woody thought, but didn't dare say it out loud.

talents.name: Chaos Ball Game
talents.desc:
While in the Cheer On! state, allies' CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 10%.

Rules and ribs are made to be broken.

talents.name: Wildland Princess
talents.desc:
Basic Attack, Dodge, Assist, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

She speaks politely to opponents screaming under her bat.
She apologizes to enemies groveling at her feet.
This is the perfect etiquette of a noble lady.

talents.name: Fierce Fangs of Fire
talents.desc:
When an ally in the Cheer On! state hits an enemy with an EX Special Attack, a guard boar will drop from the sky and cause an explosion, dealing Fire DMG equal to 300% of the guard boar’s ATK. This will extend the duration of the Cheer On! buff for all squad members by 5s. The duration can increase up to 3 times, with a maximum duration of 30s. Refreshing the Cheer On! state resets the stack count. After the guard boar’s explosion, it will launch Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!.

The little boar Thirens known as the Crimson Mane Guard are always at the forefront of battle!

Though it's hard to tell if, at the moment they're launched by the bat, they feel total despair or just accept their fate.

Brave little boars, leading the charge!
